casebody.data:
99-0628 (La. 4/23/99)

Raymond GRANGER, Jr., et al. v. ECONOMY FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, et al. No. 99-C-0628. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Granger, Raymond, Jr.; Tous-saint, Laurent; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Avoyelles 12th Judicial District Court *888Div. “B” Number 96-2481; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-1063

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J. not on panel.
